title: fix: correct invalid model name and enable router logging
author: ElliotEtag

gist.headline: Polly checks the phonebook
gist.blurb: Fixed a typo in our internal automation model selection. Even bots need to dial the right number.
gist.summary: Corrected an invalid model identifier in the auto-fix workflow and enabled router logging for better debugging.
gist.impact: Restores functionality to the automated issue-handling bot.
gist.visual_concept: The bee mascot looking at a large directory or phonebook, realizing a name was wrong. A robot companion holds a lantern.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of the bee mascot looking at a large pixelated directory book, correcting a name with a pencil. A small robot with a monitor head holds a lantern nearby. Lime green (#ecf874) and lavender gradient background. Chunky retro sprites, warm lighting, lo-fi vibes like Stardew Valley. Pixel text: 'DEBUG'. Nostalgic but beautiful.
